name: vinelab/neoeloquent-support
description: Fork of the Illuminate Support package to be used with Vinelab/NeoEloquent.

suggest.jeremeamia/superclosure: Required to be able to serialize closures (~2.2).
suggest.paragonie/random_compat: Provides a compatible interface like PHP7's random_bytes() in PHP 5 projects (~1.1).
suggest.symfony/process: Required to use the composer class (3.1.*).
suggest.symfony/var-dumper: Required to use the dd function (3.1.*).
